content: materials 17 skeins of purl soho s picnic cotton 1 100% peruvian pima cotton each skein is 164 yards/ 50 grams - main color mc 7 skeins approximately 1080 total yards required - colors a e 10 skeins 2 per color approximately 305 total yards required of each color you will also need… - us 8 5 mm 32-inch circular needles 2 - a removable marker 3 or piece of scrap yarn we used these 3 palettes… veggie garden - mc heirloom white - colors a e mint julep sugar plum key lime sweet nectarine summer hay rosehip - mc heirloom white - colors a e rose bark red poppy bright flamingo pink peppermint pink sand creek - mc heirloom white - colors a e purple aster cobalt blue high seas blue speckled wren sky + clouds gauge 20 stitches and 38 row 19 garter ridges = 4 inches in garter stitch holding two strands together size finished dimensions 30 inches wide x 36 inches long notes yarn doubled throughout this pattern you will hold two strands of one color together the easiest way to do this is to wind two skeins into separate balls for the last skein of the main color pull a strand from the inside and outside of the ball designed by purl soho designers hiromi glover 5 and keith foster 6 click here 7 to see even more of hiromi s work and here 8 to see more of keith s 1 https //www purlsoho com/picnic-cotton html 2 https //www purlsoho com/tools-and-notions/knitting-and-crochet html collection_filter=23796 3 https //www purlsoho com/tools-and-notions/knitting-and-crochet html collection_filter=964 5 https //www purlsoho com/create/tag/hiromi-glover-for-purl-soho/ 6 https //www purlsoho com/create/tag/keith-foster-for-purl-soho/ 7 https //www instagram com/mignonnegrise/ 8 https //www kelsongoods com/
